text: If you’re looking to upload to the files tool use `hs filemanager upload`  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upload>

Hello everyone, happy Friday to you all. So, we’re trying to establish a good staging/production workflow for our themes. I’d like for my team to work in their own sandbox accounts. Does anyone have a script that “copies” all necessary data from instance to instance? I’d like to copy what we have in our production instance to staging so things are in sync from the start. Thanks!
Please let me know if this is possible, or would it be better to put in a ticket. We’re HubSpot partners
